name: Kazmania 2: Chaos in Kazmania
overview: Dr. DaBabba and his Inkerators are trying to prevent the return of the print to all the books in the land of KazMania. They must be stopped or there will be nothing left to read! Your child will read and compose poetry as he or she travels through KazMania with the sleuth, Mem, and the poet Octavio to help put an end to DaBadda's plot.
